title: JSON schema for Unreal Engine uproject
description: Descriptor for projects. Contains all the information contained within a .uproject file.

Category.description: Category to show under the project browser.

Description.description: Description to show in the project browser.

DisableEnginePluginsByDefault.description: Indicates that enabled by default engine plugins should not be enabled unless explicitly enabled by the project or target files.

EngineAssociation.description: The engine to open this project with. Denotes by <major>.<minor> convention e.g. 4.20, 5.0 or source engine hash.
EngineAssociation.markdownDescription: The engine to open this project with. Denotes by `<major>.<minor>` convention e.g. `4.20`, `5.0` or source engine GUID.

EpicSampleNameHash.description: A hash that is used to determine if the project was forked from a sample.

FileVersion.$comment: More details can be found in https://docs.unrealengine.com/4.26/en-US/API/Runtime/Projects/EProjectDescriptorVersion__Type/
FileVersion.markdownDescription: Descriptor version number. More details can be found in the [EProjectDescriptorVersion](https://docs.unrealengine.com/4.26/en-US/API/Runtime/Projects/EProjectDescriptorVersion__Type/).

IsEnterpriseProject.description: Indicates if this project is an Enterprise project.

Modules.description: List of all modules associated with this project.

Plugins.description: List of plugins for this project (may be enabled/disabled).

PostBuildSteps.description: Custom steps to execute after building targets in this project.
PostBuildSteps.$comment: Define platform as key, command as value.

PreBuildSteps.description: Custom steps to execute before building targets in this project.
PreBuildSteps.$comment: Define platform as key, command as value.

TargetPlatforms.description: Array of platforms that this project is targeting.

BuildConfiguration.description: Available build configurations. Mirorred from UnrealTargetConfiguration.

AdditionalDependencies.description: List of additional dependencies for building this module.

HasExplicitPlatforms.description: When true, an empty PlatformAllowList is interpeted as 'no platforms' with the expectation that explict platforms will be added in plugin extensions.
HasExplicitPlatforms.markdownDescription: When true, an empty `PlatformAllowList` is interpeted as **no platforms** with the expectation that explict platforms will be added in plugin extensions.

LoadingPhase.description: When should the module be loaded during the startup sequence? This is sort of an advanced setting.

Description.description: Description of the plugin for users that do not have it installed.

Enabled.description: Whether it should be enabled by default.

HasExplicitPlatforms.description: When true, empty SupportedTargetPlatforms and PlatformAllowList are interpreted as 'no platforms' with the expectation that explicit platforms will be added in plugin platform extensions.
HasExplicitPlatforms.markdownDescription: When true, empty `SupportedTargetPlatforms` and `PlatformAllowList` are interpreted as **no platforms** with the expectation that explicit platforms will be added in plugin platform extensions.

MarketplaceURL.description: URL for this plugin on the marketplace, if the user doesn't have it installed.

Optional.description: Whether this plugin is optional, and the game should silently ignore it not being present.

markdownDescription: Descriptor for projects. Contains all the information contained within a `.uproject` file.
